it.polimi.ingsw.shared.view.remote

Class InputStreamMessageSupplier

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.shared.view.remote.InputStreamMessageSupplier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOSupplier<Message>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class InputStreamMessageSupplier
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOSupplier<Message>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An input message supplier that waits for data to be available into a given input stream, parses it and then return a Message instance
    Author:
    Carlo Dell'Acqua

      Fields

      private java.io.DataInputStream inputStream
      Input stream to read from
      protected java.util.logging.Logger logger
      Logging utility
      private java.util.concurrent.Future<Message> messageReceiveTask
      A future that will hold the result of the input stream reading and parsing
      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService threadPool
      Thread pool that runs the background tasks

      • get

        public Message get(int timeout,
                   java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return a message read from the input stream if available
        Specified by:
        get in interface IOSupplier<Message>
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum time to wait for a message to be available
        unit - the measurement unit of the timeout
        Returns:
        a Message read from the input stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the input stream cannot be read
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if no message is available within the specified timeout
